Does anybody have favorite memories of playing Gladiator or moments that stick out when playing gladiator?

I'll share one: the first time I went through all the scenarios (builtin, tevfifty, and mine) I went "WOW" when I realized how scenarios I 
had gone through in short period of time and how powerfull was team was.
